column1: #Text=Henein is a brilliant lawyer and well her opinion piece was well written she missed so many other subtleties.
#Text=They saw her as an entitled white woman.
#Text=Read the Detroit papers if you don't think so.
#Text=It's not something the defeated want to discuss or address, but they know it and will never admit it.
#Text=If they came out in force as to what they did for Barack Obama in 2008 or 2012, this opinion would not be in electronic print.
#Text=No, I don't like Donald Trump but neither do I like Hillary Clinton.
#Text=Gender had nothing to do with it and your path to shattering the glass ceiling certainly does not rest with Hillary Clinton.
#Text=It may have been shattered decades ago.
